channel.title: Projects on Shannon J. O'Leary
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Shannon J. O'Leary

item.title: Patterns of connectivity and local adaptation in marine fishes
item.description: Assessment of neutral mechanisms (gene flow & genetic drift) and selective pressures (environmental & anthropogenic parameters) resulting in the observed within- and between-group patterns of genetic diversity of fish populations.

item.title: Population-level effects of oil exposure on the genetic diversity of demersal fishes
item.description: Spatiotemporal comparisons to identify a population-level effect on the genetic diversity of demersal fish populations and genetic-environmental associations correlating genotypes to PAH data sets.

item.title: Genetic Diversity of Small Populations
item.description: The effect of inbreeding and genetic drift eroding genetic diversity increases with decreasing effective population sizes resulting in a loss of adaptive potential and increased vulnerability to extinction.
